original_text: This temple will become a heap of rubble. All who pass by will be appalled and say, ‘Why has the Lord done such a thing to this land and to this temple?’
korean_text: 이 성전이 비록 높을지라도 그리로 지나가는 자마다 놀라 이르되 여호와께서 무슨 까닭으로 이 땅과 이 성전에 이같이 행하셨는고 하면

sentences.original_text: This temple will become a heap of rubble
All who pass by will be appalled
Why has the Lord done such a thing
to this land and to this temple?
